title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian dish of sautéed pieces of beef served in a sauce with smetana (sour cream).

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish made with a variety of fresh vegetables sautéed in a savory sauce.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips, perfect for any occasion.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup and butter, perfect for breakfast.

title: Guacamole
summary: A creamy avocado dip mixed with lime juice, onions, tomatoes, and cilantro.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
summary: Succulent shrimp cooked in a zesty lemon garlic sauce, perfect for a quick meal.

title: French Onion Soup
summary: A rich soup made with caramelized onions, beef broth, and topped with melted cheese.

title: Tacos al Pastor
summary: Mexican tacos filled with marinated pork, pineapple, onions, and cilantro.

title: Banana Bread
summary: Moist and flavorful banana bread, perfect for breakfast or a snack.

title: Caprese Salad
summary: A simple Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar.

title: Buffalo Wings
summary: Crispy chicken wings tossed in a spicy buffalo sauce, served with blue cheese dressing.
